content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: RSUBJID
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value: POOLDEF.POOLID
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0158
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error if relationship described is to a pool and RSUBJID is not
  in POOLDEF.POOLID
Outcome:
  Message: RSUBJID is not in POOLDEF.POOLID
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0158
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: RSUBJID will be populated with the USUBJID of the
                  related subject or the POOLID of the related pool.
                Document: AP Guide v1.0
                Item: Specification
                Section: 2.1.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ASSOCIATE PERSONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error if relationship described is to a pool and RSUBJID is not in POOLDEF.POOLID

Citations.Cited_Guidance: RSUBJID will be populated with the USUBJID of the related subject or the POOLID of the related pool.
